EmailTemplate.description: Includes customised survey link (Coveris 8 Week Post Program Survey) in SG3
EmailTemplate.name: Coveris 8 Week Survey Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Remember: ENSI Impact & Value Survey DUE: {!Contact.Job_3_month_case_study_due__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ENS International Participant Email
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
'Expand the possibilities'
Remember to share with us the impact and value you have seen since your ENS workshop on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}.
Please click here to access the survey. http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1725411/ENS-Eight-Week-Must-Win-Can-t-Fail-Impact-and-Value-Survey?jid={!Contact.Last_Job_ID__c}&pid={!Contact.Last_Participant_Id__c}
This link is specific to you, please don't forward it to others.
NB: If you have already started your survey and have opted to 'save and continue' while in the survey - it is important that you use the link that was sent to you at the time you saved your response, otherwise the above link will open a new survey.
It would be appreciated if you could complete your response by: {!Contact.Job_3_month_case_study_due__c}.
Kind regards,
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} {!Contact.Job_CSC_Title__c}
ENS International - Level 5, 83 York Street, Sydney 2000, NSW, Australia Phone: +61 2 9299 9688
